properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Ee Bwana Mungu
na mimi nikupe nini?
Nina zawadi kidogo
ee Bwana wangu
pokea zawadi.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Ee Bwana Mungu
na mimi nikupe nini?
Nakutolea mkate nayo divai,
pokea zawadi.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Ee Bwana Mungu
na mimi nikupe nini ?
Na kutolea
mazao ya mashambani,
pokea zawadi.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Ee Bwana Mungu
na mimi nikupe nini ?
Nilivyo navyo
ni vyako ee Bwana wangu,
pokea zawadi.
